bibl.author: Meigs, Return Jonathan
bibl.note: This document is a spoliation claim made by Lillecocker of the Creek Nation. The claim states that U.S. troops killed a cow worth six dollars while passing through the Creek Nation. The claim is signed by Return J. Meigs, agent to the Cherokee Nation.
